Package boundary

Class ManagerInterface

Object
ManagerInterface
public class ManagerInterface extends Object
The ManagerInterface class provides a user interface for a manager to manage projects, enquiries, applications, and withdrawal requests. It includes options to view and modify projects, approve or reject applications and withdrawals, and handle enquiries.

  • Constructor Details

    • ManagerInterface

      public ManagerInterface()

  • Method Details

    • showMenu

      public static void showMenu(Manager manager, Scanner sc, Data data)
      Displays the manager menu and processes the manager's choice. The manager can view all projects, all enquiries, their own projects, view withdrawal requests, and manage account settings.
      Parameters:
      manager - the manager object for whom the menu is displayed
      sc - the scanner object to read user input
      data - the data object containing the application data

    • projectMenu

      public static void projectMenu(Manager manager, Scanner sc, Data data)
      Displays the menu for managing the manager's projects. Allows sorting, selecting, and creating projects.
      Parameters:
      manager - the manager object for whom the project menu is displayed
      sc - the scanner object to read user input
      data - the data object containing the application data

    • selectedProjectMenu

      public static void selectedProjectMenu(Project project, Manager manager, Scanner sc, Data data)
      Displays the menu for managing a selected project. Allows the manager to toggle visibility, edit, delete, view registrations, applications, and enquiries, and generate reports for the project.
      Parameters:
      project - the selected project to manage
      manager - the manager object for whom the project menu is displayed
      sc - the scanner object to read user input
      data - the data object containing the application data

    • withdrawalMenu

      public static void withdrawalMenu(Manager manager, Scanner sc, Data data)
      Displays the withdrawal menu and allows the manager to approve or reject withdrawal requests.
      Parameters:
      manager - the manager object for whom the withdrawal menu is displayed
      sc - the scanner object to read user input
      data - the data object containing the application data
